iconview.linking-information: The Block Linking settings define the interaction of blocks between template and associated deliverable(s). If set to Manual, all blocks can be moved from template to associated deliverable(s) by means of drag and drop or by using the Link To functionality. If set to Automatic, all blocks as they are created in the template will flow through automatically to the associated deliverable(s) and the structure of your template will be retained in the associated deliverable(s). For more information with respect to the his behavior, please consult the relevant section of the user manual.

DTTL (also referred to as “Deloitte Global”) and each of its member firms are legally separate and independent entities. DTTL does not provide services to clients. Please see
